tool_description: A wrapper around the Vatsim API that will pull all important data out and package it in a way that is useful for client apps.
name: Vatsim Wrapper
title: Vatsim Wrapper

api_list.name: Pilots by Company
api_list.description: Returns all pilots flying for a given company (ex: DAL = Delta, UAE = Emirates, UAL = United).
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vatsim-wrapper.p.rapidapi.com/pilots/byCompany/dal"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vatsim-wrapper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://vatsim-wrapper.p.rapidapi.com/pilots/byCompany/{company}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vatsim-wrapper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Pilots by Aircraft

api_list.name: Pilot by CID
api_list.description: Returns a pilot object by the given CID.

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Controller Metadata

api_list.name: Overall Airport Data
api_list.description: Returns all active users involved in a current airport. This includes arrivals, departures, and controllers.

api_list.name: Get Total Users
api_list.description: Returns the total amount of users currently logged on to the Vatsim network.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://vatsim-wrapper.p.rapidapi.com/metadata/totalUsers"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "vatsim-wrapper.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
